summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的宽度（以字符为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the width (in characters) of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定的宽度 （以字符为单位）控件。Use the property to specify or determine the width (in characters) of the control. 如果输入的长度超过文本框的宽度的文本，文本将自动继续在该控件的下一行上。If you enter text that is longer than the width of the text box, the text automatically continues on the next line of the control. 若要控制控件的高度，设置属性。To control the height of the control, set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制的宽度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the width of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaCols#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaCols/CS/htmltextareacolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaCols#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaCols/VB/htmltextareacolsvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的唯一标识符名。

value.span: 一个字符串，表示 属性的值。

span.span: A string that represents the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来确定的唯一标识符名称控件。Use the property to determine the unique identifier name for the control. 在此实现中的属性`get`访问器返回的值属性。In this implementation of the property, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 但是，`set`访问器不会分配给此属性的值。However, the `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property. > [!NOTE] > `set`因为访问器不会对此属性分配值属性必须具有相同的值属性控件才能正常工作。The `set` accessor does not assign a value to this property because the property must have the same value as the property for the control to work properly. 继承的类类重写此实现中，如有必要。Classes that inherit from the class may override this implementation, if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来选择控件在页面上，并设置其属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to select an control on a page and set its property. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaName/CS/htmltextareanamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaName/VB/htmltextareanamevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知控件来执行任何必要的步骤之前保存的视图状态和呈现内容。The method notifies the control to perform any necessary steps prior to saving the view state and rendering content. 方法主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便始终在自定义显示 5 个行和 75 列服务器控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to always display 5 rows and 75 columns in a custom server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmltextarea_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmltextarea_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmltextarea_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlTextAreaOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmltextarea_onprerender.vb#2)]

When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control is properly registered with the page.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

summary.span: 这使你可以为事件提供自定义处理程序。

span.span: This allows you to provide a custom handler for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时的内容控件向服务器发送操作之间发生更改。The event is raised when the content of the control changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 当用户启动的发送到服务器，例如单击时，仅将引发此事件`submit`按钮。This event is only raised when the user initiates a post to the server, such as by clicking a `submit` button. 此事件不会导致发布到要发生的服务器。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态才能事件才能正常工作。The control must have viewstate enabled for the event to work correctly. 此事件通常用于执行数据验证控制用户更新控件中的文本。This event is commonly used to perform data validation on the control when the user updates the text in the control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定并创建自定义事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and create a custom event handler for the event. 在输入的值时显示一条消息控件超过 20 个字符。A message is displayed when the value entered in the control exceeds 20 characters. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可指定或确定的高度 （以字符为单位）控件。Use the property to specify or determine the height (in characters) of the control. 如果输入的文本将占用更多的行数比指定的高度，则会启用滚动条。If you enter text that takes up more lines than the height specified, scroll bars are enabled. 若要控制控件的宽度，设置属性。To control the width of the control, set the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性控制的高度控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the height of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaRows#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaRows/CS/htmltextarearowscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaRows#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaRows/VB/htmltextarearowsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ServerChange As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件的内容在向服务器的各次发送过程中发生更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content of the control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时的内容控件向服务器发送操作之间发生更改。The event is raised when the content of the control changes between posts to the server. 此事件通常用于执行数据验证的文本框中。This event is commonly used to perform data validation on the text box. > [!NOTE] > 当用户启动的发送到服务器，例如单击时，仅将引发此事件`submit`按钮。This event is only raised when the user initiates a post to the server, such as clicking a `submit` button. 此事件不会导致发布到要发生的服务器。This event does not cause a post to the server to occur. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须具有启用视图状态才能事件才能正常工作。The control must have viewstate enabled for the event to work correctly. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何指定并创建自定义事件处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and create a custom event handler for the event. 在输入的值时显示一条消息控件超过 10 个字符。A message is displayed when the value entered in the control exceeds 10 characters. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChanged/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/CS/htmltextareaserverchangecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextAreaServerChange#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextAreaServerChange/VB/htmltextareaserverchangevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件中输入的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text entered in the control.

value.span: 在 控件中输入的文本。

span.span: The text entered in the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性以编程方式控制中输入的文本控件。Use the property to programmatically control the text entered in the control. 此属性通常用于检索在文本框中输入的文本，但您还可以使用它来指定要在控件中显示的文本。This property is commonly used to retrieve the text entered in the text box, but you can also use it to specify the text to display in the control. 如果你想要提供默认值或显示一条消息中的这很有用控件。This is useful if you want to provide a default value or display a message in the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定的内容控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the contents of the control. 在网页中，然后显示内容。The contents are then displayed in the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlTextArea2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextArea2/CS/htmltextareacs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlTextArea2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlTextArea2/VB/htmltextareavb.aspx#1)]
